description:
Touya rescues a girl in the forest, and while the technology of the Alchemy Ward is able to completely heal her, her memories remain lost and she`s unable to remember her own name and how she got so injured. At her request, Touya names her Sakura.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Amnesia and the Mystic Eye of Petrification
Amnesie und die Dämonenaugen der Versteinerung
記憶喪失, そして石化の魔眼.
